name: Cro-Mag Rally (itch)
description:
CMR was released in 2000 by Pangea Software. It was a pack-in game on Macs that came out around that time.

This is a port of the original OS 9 version of the game, made under permission from Pangea Software, Inc. It aims to provide the best way to experience CMR on today’s computers. It is an “enhanced” version that fixes some bugs and brings in a few new features in keeping with the spirit of the original game.

If you're interested in the technical stuff behind this game, please visit CMR's GitHub page!
